attributes.action: cease approving petitions for this website that contain spelling errors or bad grammar.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The number of petitions on this site that contain glaring spelling errors or atrocious grammar is appalling. It creates the impression that Britain is a nation of illiterates. Petitions should not be approved until the petitioner has corrected all such errors.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
